issues.title: Pricing vendor not identified
issues.description: References 'pricing vendor' for corporate bond yields but doesn't identify which vendor
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Corporate bond yields from Bloomberg BVAL (Bloomberg Valuation)'

issues.title: Treasury data provider not specified
issues.description: References 'data provider' for Treasury yields without specifying source
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Treasury yields from U.S. Department of Treasury Daily Treasury Yield Curve Rates'

issues.title: Rating agency not specified
issues.description: References 'rating agency' but doesn't specify which one (Moody's, S&P, Fitch)
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Credit ratings from S&P Global Ratings, using composite rating if multiple available'

issues.title: Risk model not identified
issues.description: References 'risk model' for default probabilities without identifying the model
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Default probabilities from Moody's KMV Expected Default Frequency (EDF) model'

issues.title: Analytics platform not specified
issues.description: References 'analytics platform' for liquidity metrics without identification
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Liquidity metrics from Bloomberg LOQS (Liquidity and Quote Score)'

issues.title: Historical average lookback period not specified
issues.description: Uses 'historical average' without specifying the lookback period
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Historical average calculated over the past 252 trading days'

issues.title: Investment grade definition not provided
issues.description: Requires 'investment grade' rating but doesn't define the threshold
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Investment grade defined as S&P rating of BBB- or higher'

issues.title: Sufficient liquidity not defined
issues.description: Requires 'sufficient liquidity' but doesn't specify the threshold or metric
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Sufficient liquidity defined as Bloomberg LOQS score >= 7 out of 10'
